page.title: 05Amenities in the Home
page.content: l00 people were interviewed (28 male & 72 female). We found there were l9l adults & 104 children in these homes. Average age of interviewees was 52 years. 21% had a pet - dogs and cats being by far the most popular. 87% have telephones. 88% central heating with gas being most popular. All had t.v.s, 97% having colour. 27% have video recorders; 74% stereo systems; 71% automatic washing machines; 45% clothes dryers; 8% dishwashers & 24% home computers. Approx. 41% did not know the make of their electrical appliances. 43% have double glazing. 52% have fireplaces, burning mostly wood. Average length time lived in present home is 16 years. 15% were born in Frome, the rest coming from all parts of the country including 14 who came from abroad.
